title: SAMSUNG Galaxy Tab A 3 GB RAM 32 GB ROM 10.5 inch with Wi-Fi+4G Tablet (Blue)

product_specification.Additional Features: Quad Speaker with Dolby Atmos Effect, FM Radio
product_specification.Sales Package: Tablet, Adapter, USB Type C Cable, User Guide
product_specification.Sensors: Accelerometer, Gyro, Compass, RGB Light, Hall Sensor
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty Provided by the Manufacturer from Date of Purchase

product_description.Design: Featuring a 26.67-cm (10.5) Full HD Backlit LCD Display, the Galaxy Tab A is a visual treat for your eyes. Also, enjoy more out of your smartphone with a clean, plain bezel which offers no distraction.
product_description.Cinematic Display: Enjoy a cinematic-viewing experience right at home with the 26.67-cm (10.5) display and a 16:10 ratio to make your Friday-night movie experience a memorable one.
product_description.Quad Speakers: Any movie is complete only the visuals are complemented by high-quality audio. Featuring Dolby Atmos Technology, this tab automatically adjusts stereo settings according to the screen orientation, providing you with an enriched 3D surround sound experience.
product_description.Battery: With a massive 7300 mAh battery, you can unplug and enjoy up to 14.5 hours of video playback on one charge. Also, thanks to Fast Charging you don't have to wait for a long time to use it.
product_description.Smart Home Display: You can make this tab display your favourite photos, weather forecast, current time or your calendar while it charges, turning it into a smart home display.
product_description.Bixby Vision: So you're on your vacation and are trying to find your way in a new city. In those situations, Bixby Vision is your ideal companion which helps to identify landmarks, and even translates foreign language signs and menus.
product_description.Enhanced Performance: Powered by an AP chipset and 3 GB of RAM, you can run your apps and games seamlessly. Also, with 32 GB of storage space that can be expanded up to 400 GB, you can easily store all your pictures, music, and videos.
product_description.Samsung Kids Mode: With this mode, you can let your kids learn and enjoy using this tablet, while making sure to control their usage time and access to content.
product_description.Kids Mode, Reinvented: With built-in apps and content, this tab indulges your kids' curiosity and serves as an educational tool while keeping them engaged.

review:
I have been using it since 3 weeks now. My feedback is based on my experience with the device in last 3 weeks.

1. Performance & Features - This Tab A has very good ram optimisation and ROM management. It runs fast and easy-to-use. Face recognition is good with secondary lock protection.
Camera R - Ok with 8MP not great
Camera F - Not ok with 5MP dose offer good selfie pixels are disgusting.
Addone - Tap to wake up Screen is good. Lenovo phone are slow in responding.
Sound & Volume - Good mo...
READ MORE

Nice tab and looking so good .....camera and battery quality is good I like this tab but price is high but I take my decision to buy this tab in big billion day ... my delivery date its mention 10oct 2019 but I will get fast delivery on date 7oct 2019..... thanks Flipkart for fast delivery
very nice product.Delivered on time.But the accessories like flipcases/covers not available online.Flipkart should ensure that the cover is available online at the earliest
it is very good to use every day . works well and touch is much impressive.

Only tab that offers latest Android version. Having reviewed several tabs, I can confidently say, this is the only large sized tab with close to 95% screen brightness uniformity . But I have to agree that despite non uniform screen brightness, Ipads have a crisp display due to high ppi. The Dolby atmos with quad speakers is certainly a best feature offered by Samsung and one will really appreciate it.iPads miserably fail on audio front. Major pro is good network connectivity, battery life, sound, touch responsiveness and guaranteed pie update. Major cons are slow multitasking capability, with only ~200 ppi, texts on pdfs are little blurred, pathetic auto brightness and quite heavy. Overall recommendation is to buy whenever the price drops like during big billion day or other festive offer days.

Bought in sale effective 17250
Works fine though processor is slow
Cannot be compared with my iPad
But good media device with sim support
Possibly worth the money i paid

Hi Guys/Girls...this review is based on my 1 week usage of this Tab. This is an excellent purchase. Tab has a great battery life. With one Charge you can see at least 4 movies. Great display with good viewing angle. It has all the features just like a high end Smart phone.

Hi, I got this tablet for a good price in the big billion offer 2019, it’s worth the price I got it for, nice product it’s better then the 10.1 model of 2019, you can compare and check for your self.
Very good battery life ! Performance is also great!
Go for it!

Pathetic. I bought it on Aug 23 and in less than 2 months, the device wont turn on. I took it to the service centre and they informed that the device has a motherboard issue. And then they want to replace the charger and the data cable also. Horrible experience. They didn't even consider replacement. Very dissapointed. I choose Samsung Tab A over Apple iPad, Big mistake. Didn't expect something like this from Samsung. There is really no comparison between Samsung and Apple.

See basically it depends on your requirement. If u want a large screen experience, this one is for u. If its painful for u to live with small font size of your phone, this one is for u. But if u want a tablet for gaming then its performance will disappoint u. It also hangs when we rotate the screen from porttrait to landscape mode. Its internal memory is just 32 gb. But it can be compensated with 400 mb memory card. So its a mixture of pros and cons. Usb type c port can be found anywhere and pen drive/usb/data cable can be attached easily. Jio sim 4g compatible.
